#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#include<algorithm>
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t,n,i,temp;
	int win[51];
	scanint(t);
	while(t--)
	 {  
	 	scanint(n);
	 	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	 	  {
	 	  	scanint(win[i]);
	 	  	win[i]=win[i]*3;
	 	  }
	 	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	 	   {
	 	   	scanint(temp);
	 	   	 win[i]+=temp;
	 	   }
	 sort(win,win+n);
	 printf("%d\n",win[n-1]);
	 }
	 
	
	return 0;
}
